package NetsPkg;
  nettype real realNet;
endpackage : NetsPkg


module top();
   interconnect [0:1] iBus;
   lDriver l1(iBus[0]);
   rDriver r1(iBus[1]);
   rlMod m1(iBus);
endmodule : top

module lDriver(output wire logic out);
endmodule : lDriver

module rDriver
  import NetsPkg::*;
  (output realNet out);
endmodule : rDriver

module rlMod(input interconnect [0:1] iBus);
  lMod l1(iBus[0]);
  rMod r1(iBus[1]);
endmodule : rlMod
